name: A Test Game (DJdog120)
description:
This is a simple test game I made in Construct 3!

Sorry for the screen size! Adjust your Itch.io tab by using Ctrl+ or Ctrl- or Press the Fullscreen Button in the Bottom Right of the game screen.

I just messed around with random stuff. The shooting part is a gun because it was the easiest to make... The projectiles are just random, too!

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move. (Arrow Keys not Recommended)

Left Click to Shoot, Press E to get a Boomerang, Hold Q to Move the Boomerang to the Cursor, Press/Hold Ctrl to Auto Shoot, Press O and P to Control How Much the Normal Projectiles Rotate to the Cursor.

The only 'non-dev' controls are Pressing Y and U. Y turns on Damage Indicators, and U turns them off.

Just a reminder; This is not supposed to be good in any way! I just like making random things :))
